text: Hernan "Chico" Borja (August 24, 1959 – January 25, 2021) was an Ecuadorian–American soccer player and coach. He made eleven appearances for the U.S. national team from 1982 to 1988. In 1984, Borja played for the U.S. Olympic soccer team at the 1984 Summer Olympics.XXIII. Olympiad Los Angeles 1984 Football Tournament Borja was also on the U.S. team at the 1987 Pan American Games. Borja died on January 25, 2021 from colon cancer at the age of 61. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Ecuadorian footballers Category:American soccer players Category:American soccer coaches Category:Sportspeople from Quito
title: Chico Borja
